constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 22 (Thursday, February 3, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. COLE:
H.R. 6581.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 18
[Page H947]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committee on Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Bipartisan Social Security Commission Act of 2022
